lead_paragraph: Tyson Barrie had two goals and an assist and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Edmonton Oilers 3-2 Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Barrie Has 2 Goals, Assist and Avalanche Beat Oilers 3-2
headline.main: Barrie Has 2 Goals, Assist and Avalanche Beat Oilers 3-2
